column6: It's Ozma of Oz to the rescue! And the Scarecrow, the Tin Woodman, and the Cowardly Lion are with her. No sooner have they freed Dorothy and Tik-tok from the thirty-headed Princess Langwidere than they're off to liberate the slaves of the  mysterious Nome King from his vast underground caverns. Plus: Billina's showdown in the chicken coop! And introducing the Hungry Tiger.
